name: 陳玟心
objective: 本課程提供學生及職前專業人士必備之英語文語言技巧，強調設計專業領域之英文溝通能力之訓練。課程內容依學院專業內容區分並整合英語文之聽說讀寫之能力為未來全球化移動及以英語專業溝通人才培育為目標。
schedule: Detailed syllabus will be distributed during the first class meeting
scorePolicy:
Attendance: 10%
In-class Participation: 15%
Portfolio: 10%
Group Project: 15%
Midterm Exam: 15%
Final Exam: 15%
School-wide English Proficiency Test: 20%
materials:
Arts & Humanities (Book 1). 北科之英 ESP Series
Huang, S-J., & Phelps, L. (2014). English for Cultural and Creative Industries. 台北：寂天文化。
